title: Parallel Boxplots: Male Pulse Rates Versus Female Pulse Rates
question_text:
A study was conducted to compare male pulse rates and female pulse rates.
Based on the information displayed in the boxplots, which of the following statements is TRUE?

choices.text:
At least 75
% of the female pulse rates are greater than 50
% of the male pulse rates.
The mean of the male pulse rates is less than the median of the male pulse rates.
The interquartile range for the female pulse rates is larger than the male pulse rates.
There are more data points among females than males.
